scripts package¶

Submodules¶

scripts.GC_analysis module¶

A command-line utility for calculating the GC percentage of a genomic sequence.

scripts.GC_analysis.generate_result()[source]¶
scripts.GC_analysis.get_args()[source]¶

Helper function to handler all the command-line input options

scripts.GC_analysis.open_results_file()[source]¶

A helper function to create the output file in the input file location

scripts.GC_analysis.open_results_files()[source]¶

A helper function to create the output file in the input file location

scripts.GC_analysis.write_content(loc, data)[source]¶
scripts.GC_analysis.write_title()[source]¶

Parse the title from the fasta file and write the relevant information to the track definition line of the wiggle file.
